title: svAmi shiridum
sahitya:
svAmi shiridum dayai vallaiyA taruNamIdayyA sarasa gOpAla


anupallavi

  bhUmi pugazhum madhurApuri nAyaka bhUtanai enum pEi tanai mAitta vA shrI krSNa


caraNam 1    kALingan muDi tanil gELI natAm puriyum tALA dayALA vandALAi kaNNALA en
   caraNam 2    gOpiyar kadara avar AdaigaL kavarndeLittAi draupadikku ADai tandu mAnamum kAttAi mAyanE
   caraNam 3    vAsudEva ghana shyAmaLa rAmadAsa varada jaganmOhana Ezhai en
